text: The International Fight League was an American mixed martial arts (MMA) league and is the world's first MMA league. It was founded on January 7, 2006 and closed on July 31, 2008. Instead of the established norm for MMA events, where matchups are strictly one-on-one affairs, each IFL card was a showdown between two teams of five fighters, each fighter fighting one match against another on the opposing team. The IFL was shown in the United States on Fox Sports Net and MyNetworkTV. == Other websites == *IFL - Official Website Category:Mixed martial arts organizations Category:2006 establishments in the United States Category:2008 disestablishments in the United States
title: International Fight League
